quote: Well now if you take a look at the votes, when I say that, I mean mostly they register wrong, in other words, for the votes, they register incorrectly, and/or illegally. And they then vote. You have tremendous numbers of people.

name: Donald Trump
where: TIME Magazine interview on truth and falsehoods

claims.title: voter fraud in 2016 election
